name: Beryllium sulfite
desc: Beryllium sulfite is a chemical compound with the chemical formula BeSO3. It is the beryllium salt of sulfurous acid. It is easily oxidized by oxygen, which produces beryllium sulfate. It can be formed from reacting beryllium with sulfurous acid.
